entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then periods of light snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
